actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Leahy, Committee on the Judiciary, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 7.
By unanimous consent agreement, debate and vote on Feburary 25, 2013.
Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93
name: Robert E. Bacharach
nominee: Robert E. Bacharach, of Oklahoma, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Tenth Circuit
position: United States Circuit Judge for the Tenth Circuit
